citations.narrative:
While taking photos with a capuchin at a rattlesnake festival in Waurika Oklahoma, the licensee did not have a
contingency plan. Traveling entities such as this one must carry a copy of their contingency plan with them at all times
and make it available for APHIS inspection while in travel status. The licensee was unaware that a contingency plan was
needed. The inspector provided the licensee with the contingency plan form at the time of inspection to be filled out by the
licensee as soon as possible. The licensee must follow an appropriate plan to provide for the care and transport of their
animals in the event of an emergency or disaster.
CORRECT BY: 4/10/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
While taking photos with a capuchin at a rattlesnake festival in Waurika Oklahoma, the licensee did not have a 
contingency plan. Traveling entities such as this one must carry a copy of their contingency plan with them at all times 
and make it available for APHIS inspection while in travel status. The licensee was unaware that a contingency plan was 
needed. The inspector provided the licensee with the contingency plan form at the time of inspection to be filled out by the 
licensee as soon as possible. The licensee must follow an appropriate plan to provide for the care and transport of their 
animals in the event of an emergency or disaster.  
CORRECT BY: 4/10/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
